org.apache.river.test.spec.renewalservice

Class ExpireSetSleepTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.spec.renewalservice.AbstractLeaseRenewalServiceTest
        • org.apache.river.test.spec.renewalservice.ExpireSetSleepTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpireSetCancelTest

    public class ExpireSetSleepTest
extends AbstractLeaseRenewalServiceTest
    ExpireSetSleepTest asserts that a lease renewal set is nullified when its lease expires but including that any leases in the set are not renewed after the set expires.

      • run

        public void run()
         throws Exception
        This method asserts that a lease renewal set is nullified when its lease expires but including that any leases in the set are not renewed after the set expires.

        Notes:
        For more information see the LRS specification section 9.3 page 108.

        Throws:
        Exception - if the test fails for any reason

      • expireRenewalSetLease

        protected boolean expireRenewalSetLease(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease)
                                 throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
                                        RemoteException,
                                        InterruptedException
        This method determines how the renewal set lease is canceled.

        Notes:

        This method is sort of a template method to support reuse of test code.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease to expire
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException
